publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2750 Irene Oldfather: British Town Crier Championships 2002, Kilwinning—That the Parliament notes that the forthcoming British Town Crier Championships will be held in Kilwinning, Ayrshire on 15 June 2002; recognises that this is the first time the championships have ever been held in Scotland; welcomes the fact that the colourful nature of this event will give a much needed boost to the local tourist economy; congratulates the organising committee for their efforts in securing the championships for Kilwinning, and calls upon VisitScotland to take advantage of this unique opportunity to promote Scottish tourism.

S1M-2750 Irene Oldfather: British Town Crier Championships 2002, Kilwinning—That the Parliament notes that the forthcoming British Town Crier Championships will be held in Kilwinning, Ayrshire on 15 June 2002; recognises that this is the first time the championships have ever been held in Scotland; welcomes the fact that the colourful nature of this event will give a much needed boost to the local tourist economy; congratulates the organising committee for their efforts in securing the championships for Kilwinning, and calls upon VisitScotland to take advantage of this unique opportunity to promote Scottish tourism. Supported by: Mr Murray Tosh*, Michael Russell*
S1M-2750 British Town Crier Championships 2002, Kilwinning (lodged on 14 February 2002) Nora Radcliffe*
S1M-2750 British Town Crier Championships 2002, Kilwinning (lodged on 14 February 2002) Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2750 British Town Crier Championships 2002, Kilwinning (lodged on 14 February 2002) Elaine Smith*
